select_chain_to_connect: Select the chain you will connect to
trial_version_warning: This is a trial version, do not make payments with your real data.
header_main_title: Connect. Sell. Grow. Be part, here your sales boost the success of <1>everyone</1>.
header_subtitle: At MonexUp, you join incredible product networks, sell freely, recruit new talents, and multiply your results.
home_features_subtitle: EHR offers a comprehensive set of features designed to meet the needs of patients, healthcare providers, and organizations:
home_feature_product_catalog_desc: Easy access to products from the networks you participate in.
home_feature_multiple_networks_desc: Participate in various affiliated networks. Manage each network separately and organized.
home_feature_products_services_desc: Payments via Credit Card, Boleto, and PIX.
home_feature_team_management_desc: Recruit new sellers. Track the performance and growth of your team.
home_feature_admin_panel_desc: Manage products, networks, users, and payments. Full control over your network's operation.
home_feature_reports_commissions_desc: View sales, commissions, and network progress. Detailed reports for decision-making.
home_feature_responsive_interface_desc: Fully adapted for mobile devices. Smooth and fast experience, wherever you are.
home_feature_interactive_network_tree_de: Visualize your network graphically and intuitively. Track your team's growth in real time.
home_feature_security_transparency_desc: Data protected with encryption. Complete history of transactions and movements.

footer_description: MonexUp is a marketing place and networking platform, designed to ensure fair commissions and direct connections between donors and representatives.
